meanings.definition: A type of fried dough pastry typically dusted with powdered sugar.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious zeppole at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells zeppole every weekend.
meanings.sent3: The zeppole looked like fluffy clouds sprinkled with magic.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and sweet as a zeppole.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly fried zeppole filled the room.

meanings.definition: A traditional Italian dessert often served during festivals or special occasions.
meanings.sent1: Grandma makes the best zeppole for our family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The wedding reception featured a tower of zeppole.
meanings.sent3: The zeppole danced on the plate, tempting me to take a bite.
meanings.sent4: The memories of childhood are sweeter than any zeppole.
meanings.sent5: The golden zeppole glistened under the festive lights.
